response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to exceed all your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled performance and unmatched value. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe its true worth exceeds $1,200,000. Considering the high demand and limited availability, I am extending to you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, and I assure you, it represents an outstanding investment with potential returns far beyond the initial cost. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your operations or endeavors. Kindly let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
